quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Collin Powell

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I remember, involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising everytime we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchhill

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: Fail THRICE ____ THAT IS THE WAY
quotes.author: ME FAILING NO MORE

quotes.quote: TEST 2 MILLION - as an edit OPTIMISTIC
quotes.author: A tired boy dreams on
